name: Gemma Law Associates Inc
tag_list: personal-injury, vehicle-accidents, medical-malpractice, wrongful-death, product-injuries, dangerous-drugs, workers-compensation, construction-accidents, social-security-disability
overview:
Gemma Law Associates, Inc. has represented injured persons for over 40 years. Our hard work, dedication, and proven success has earned us a reputation as one of the top Rhode Island law firms.

Our mission is simple: to protect the rights of our clients through ethical and aggressive representation. We strive to achieve the best possible outcome each and every one of our clients.

Gemma Law is one of the most skilled and experienced law firms in Rhode Island. Most of our cases are settled before they go to trial. If you have been injured, please contact us today for a free consultation.
